mapper.select: select r.id,r.worker,r.classtype,r.fenpeiren,r.state,r.cci,r.cca,r.csets,r.ipca,r.ipci, (to_date(fenpeitime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as fenpeitime, (to_date(chuantime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as chuantime from fenlei_baohu_result r where r.id=#{id}

select r.id,r.worker,r.classtype,r.fenpeiren,r.state,r.cci,r.cca,r.csets,r.ipca,r.ipci,r.ipcmi,r.ipcoi,r.message, (to_date(r.fenpeitime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as fenpeitime, (to_date(r.chuantime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as chuantime from fenlei_baohu_result r where r.id=#{id}
select r.id,r.worker,r.classtype,r.ipci,r.cci,r.cca,r.csets,r.state, m.type from fenlei_baohu_main m,fenlei_baohu_result r where m.id=r.id and r.worker like concat('%',#{worker}) and r.id=#{id}
select count(1) from fenlei_baohu_result where id=#{id} and state < 2
select r.worker from fenlei_baohu_result r where r.id=#{id}
select state from fenlei_baohu_result where id=#{id} and worker=#{worker}
select r.ipcmi from fenlei_baohu_result r where r.id=#{id} and r.ipcmi is not null
select r.ipcoi from fenlei_baohu_result r where r.id=#{id} and r.ipcoi is not null order by r.ipcmi,r.worker
select r.ipca from fenlei_baohu_result r where r.id=#{id} and r.ipca is not null order by r.ipcmi,r.worker
select r.csets from fenlei_baohu_result r where r.id=#{id} and r.csets is not null order by r.ipcmi,r.worker
select r.cci from fenlei_baohu_result r where r.id=#{id} and r.cci is not null order by r.ipcmi,r.worker
select r.cca from fenlei_baohu_result r where r.id=#{id} and r.cca is not null order by r.ipcmi,r.worker

select r.id as id, r.worker as worker, r.ipcmi as ipcmi, r.ipcoi as ipcoi, r.ipca as ipca, r.cci as cci, r.cca as cca, r.csets as csets, m.simpleclasscode as simpleclasscode from FENLEI_BAOHU_result r, FENLEI_BAOHU_main m where r.id = m.id and r.id = #{id} order by ipcmi,ipcoi,ipca,cci,cca,csets

select substr(t.worker, 1, 6) as fldm, substr(t.worker, 8) as worker, t2.dep1, t2.dep2, t2.orgname, t.id, t2.email, t.worker as worker_all, t.fenpeitime, t1.simpleclasscode, t1.mingcheng from FENLEI_BAOHU_RESULT t left join FENLEI_BAOHU_MAIN t1 on t.id = t1.id left join fenlei_baohu_userinfo t2 on substr(t.worker, 1, 6) = t2.loginname where t.state != '2' order by fldm asc
mapper.update: update fenlei_baohu_result r set r.state=#{state} where r.id=#{id}

update fenlei_baohu_result
ipca = #{ext.ipca},
ipca = '',
IPCMI = #{ext.IPCMI},
IPCMI = '',
IPCOI = #{ext.IPCOI},
IPCOI = '',
CCI = #{ext.cci},
CCI = '',
CCA = #{ext.cca},
CCA = '',
CSETS = #{ext.csets},
CSETS = '',
state = #{ext.state},
state = '',
where id = #{ext.id} and worker = #{worker}
